definitions.definition: One who relays confidential information to someone, especially to the police ; an informer .

A native speaker who acts as a linguistic reference for a language being studied. The informant demonstrates native pronunciation , provides grammaticality judgments regarding linguistic well-formedness , and may also explain cultural references and other important contextual information.

main_definition: One who relays confidential information to someone, especially to the police ; an informer .
secondary_definitions: ( linguistics ) A native speaker who acts as a linguistic reference for a language being studied. The informant demonstrates native pronunciation , provides grammaticality judgments regarding linguistic well-formedness , and may also explain cultural references and other important contextual information.
